term.title: impinger

item.text: A sampling instrument employing impingement for the collection of particulate matter. Common types are: Impingers are also suitable for sampling certain gases and vapours. the midget impinger employing impingement in 1-10 cm3-75 cm3 water, the standard impinger employing impingement in water and dry impingers.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2196 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
